DOC.brief_summary: Randomized clinical trial compare radial artery patency transradial coronary catheterization use 2 different hemostasis technique . Patients submit diagnostic therapeutic coronary catheterization prospectively enrol single-center trial randomize radial hemostasis TerumoBand® standardize compressive dressing gauze elastic bandage .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison 2 Hemostasis Techniques After Transradial Coronary
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized clinical trial compare radial artery patency transradial coronary catheterization use 2 different hemostasis technique . Patients submit diagnostic therapeutic coronary catheterization prospectively enrol single-center trial randomize radial hemostasis TerumoBand® standardize compressive dressing gauze elastic bandage . Interventions : Radial hemostasis TerumoBand® Radial hemostasis standardize compressive dressing
DOC.criteria: Adult patient submit elective urgent coronary catheterization present A , B C curve oximetry test procedure Inability understand study sign inform consent form
